query:
SELECT id, name, assetType, mapX, mapY, floorLevelId 
FROM vacant_shops 
WHERE centreId = (SELECT id FROM shopping_centres WHERE name LIKE '%Eastgate%')
UNION ALL
SELECT id, name, assetType, mapX, mapY, floorLevelId 
FROM third_line_income 
WHERE centreId = (SELECT id FROM shopping_centres WHERE name LIKE '%Eastgate%');
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 21ksxipa4kLneoE.root --database 6yeAhZnHexQXKcGnnUhDLE --execute SELECT id, name, assetType, mapX, mapY, floorLevelId 
FROM vacant_shops 
WHERE centreId = (SELECT id FROM shopping_centres WHERE name LIKE '%Eastgate%')
UNION ALL
SELECT id, name, assetType, mapX, mapY, floorLevelId 
FROM third_line_income 
WHERE centreId = (SELECT id FROM shopping_centres WHERE name LIKE '%Eastgate%');
